UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A Short Double-Stapled Peptide Inhibits Respiratory Syncytial Virus Entry and Spreading.
Literature.Author: Gaillard V, Garcin D, Eléouët JF, Le Goffic R, Larcher T, Rameix-Welti MA, Boukadiri A, Héritier J, Segura JM, Baechler E, Arrell M, Mottet-Osman G, Nyanguile O
